summary: Higher detailed, new textures related to embers and smoke.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#FFFF00]From Bethesda\'s High Res Texture Pack, only the giant\'s wood texture was improved from 256x512 to 512x1024.[/color]

[color=#FF0000]Missing textures, weirdly colored logs/embers are not a fault of this mod. Download the fix [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8236]here[/URL]. [/color]

[b]Version History:[/b]
1.4 Embers remade, new textures for giant\'s fire wood and ash
1.3 Fire effects removed for future mod, delete gradients folder and fxsmokesoftsub.dds and fxsmokesoftsub01.dds if updating from a previous version

[b]Description:[/b]
Higher detailed, new textures related to embers and smoke.

[b]To Install:[/b]
Extract \"Data\" folder from 7zip file and place in [...]\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim folder.

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2LD5mF4xFsc]Manual installation tutorial courtesy of dreadfear (Maya).[/url]

[b]To Update:[/b]
Extract \"Data\" folder from 7zip file and place in [...]\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim folder and overwrite everything.

[b]To Uninstall delete the following:[/b]

Embers:
fxembers.dds in data\\textures\\effects.

Smoke:
smokeparticles01.dds in data\\textures\\effects.

Giant\'s Fire Wood:
giantwoodfires01.dds and giantwoodfires01_g.dds in data\\textures\\clutter\\woodfires.

Ash:
ash01_g.dds in data\\textures\\clutter.
ash01.dds and ash01_n.dds in data\\textures\\clutter\\woodfires.

[b]Other Mods:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/711]Realistic Water Textures and Terrain[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1653]Alternate Sun Glare[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2532]Intricate Spider Webs[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2947]Deadly Spell Impacts[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6971]Visible Windows[/url]
author: isoku
